Sep 19, 2016

This week on Product Hunt (September 12-September 18)

This is the 33rd edition of This week on Product Hunt — a collection of my favorite products on Product Hunt each week.

September 12

VotePlz–Literally the easiest way to vote.
AppFollow 2.0–The best way to track app activities in the appstores.
Neon MFG–Handmade neon art for your wall.
Mailparser.io 2.0–Extract data from emails. Automate your workflow.
Mubert–Electronic music generated in real-time just for you.
Geo Screenshot–Test your webpage from multiple locations worldwide.

September 13

Hardbound–Stories for curious minds.
Launchaco–Instantly search domains, social media handles & logotypes.
AWWWA–Animated backgrounds for iPhone with stories inside.
Virusdie–Clean and protect your websites like a security expert.
Toby–Organize your browser tabs.

September 14

Self-Driving Uber–The world’s first Self-Driving Ubers.
Streethacker–Discover great restaurants through 10 second videos.
Swift Playgrounds–Makes it fun to learn and experiment with code.
Vectr 1.0–Free, cross-platform vector graphics editor.
Clearbit Reveal–Turn anonymous traffic into company data.
Foursquare 10–Your ultimate city guide, in your pocket.

September 15

Slack Beta–A faster and nicer Slack built on Electron.
Startup Rocket Framework–Framework to help entrepreneurs w/ the first critical steps.
A-List by AngelList–Hire top tech talent, first.
Coderoulette–Pair programming game for developers
focusmusic.fm–Music for work, productivity, and flow.
Outsite for Retreats–Team retreats and offsites as a service.

September 16

Cardlife–All your business (SaaS) subscriptions in one.
Logo Pizza–Hot and ready logos for sale.
App Tools–Curated list of the best tools in the mobile app ecosystem.
Polarr 3.0 for iOS–Group selfie facial recognition meets the powerful editor.
Slogan–Generate logos for open-source projects.

September 17

Stock Apparel–Tshirts of terrible stock photos for purchase.
Elwing Boards–The world’s most compact electric skateboard.
What The Bot?!–Convos with chatbots to make you SMH and LOL.
Cirtru–Roommates, rentals, sublets by professionals & students.

September 18

Trifecta Workout–A beautiful, simply designed personal trainer for iPhone.
Atom–The easiest way to go to the movies.
Pogolist–A curated list of resources for Pokémon GO.

Let me know your favorite hunts on Product Hunt from last week.

Until next week, Au Revoir!
